channel.title: Butter on Tiny Tavern
channel.description: Recent content in Butter on Tiny Tavern

item.title: Basic Omelette
item.description: Tomato, onion, cheese, 1-Egg omelette served with 2 slices of toast: white or wheat.

item.title: Build your Omelet (with cheese)
item.description: Mushroom, turkey bacon, sweet pepper, cheese, 1-Egg omelette served with 2 slices of toast: white or wheat.

item.title: Classic French Toast Platter
item.description: 2 slices of toast dusted with powdered sugar, served with syrup and scrambled eggs.

item.title: Specialty Omelette
item.description: Mushroom, turkey bacon, sweet pepper, cheese, 1-Egg omelette served with 2 slices of toast: white or wheat.

item.title: TT's Simple Breakfast Platter
item.description: (Served with jam, compote, or whipped cream) 1 pancake of your choice, 1 waffle of your choice, 2 scrambled eggs, 2 crispy turkey bacon or sautéed sausages, and 2 slices of toast.

item.title: TT's Supreme Breakfast Platter
item.description: (Served with 1-egg omelette) 1 pancake of your choice, 1 waffle of your choice, 2 omelettes of your choice (4 toppings maximum per omelette), 2 crispy turkey bacon, sautéed sausages, and 3 slices of toast.
